message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's a valuable asset, and I believe it will be a great addition to your operations.  My initial offer is $850000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $780000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $780000 is a bit too low for me at this point.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $820000. This would still be a great deal for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $800000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $810000. This is my final offer, let's see if we can make a deal.
